00025 #ifndef __SAMPLER_H_
00026 #define __SAMPLER_H_
00027 
00031 struct SamplerContext
00032 {
00033     int lastPosition;
00034     int samplingPeriod;
00035     int lastOutput;
00036     int lastInput;
00037     bool hasMore;
00038 };
00039 
00043 void
00044 SamplerInit (SamplerContext &context, int currentPosition, int samplingPeriod)
00045 {
00046     context.lastPosition = currentPosition;
00047     context.samplingPeriod = samplingPeriod;
00048     context.lastOutput = -1;
00049     context.lastInput = -1;
00050     context.hasMore = false;
00051 }
00052 
00055 int
00056 SamplerGet (SamplerContext &context, int currentPosition, int sampleInput)
00057 {
00058     /* If current sampling period hasn't arrived, return no sample */
00059     if (currentPosition < context.lastPosition + context.samplingPeriod)
00060         return -1;
00061 
00062     context.lastPosition += context.samplingPeriod;
00063     context.lastOutput = sampleInput;
00064     context.lastInput = sampleInput;
00065 
00066     if (currentPosition < context.lastPosition + context.samplingPeriod)
00067         context.hasMore = true;
00068     else
00069         context.hasMore = false;
00070     return sampleInput;
00071 }
00072 
00073 #endif
